dcterms:creator: F. De La Torre
J. Hodgins
A. Bargteil

dcterms:description: The CMU dataset is a multimodal activity database that includes various activities captured in a controlled environment, focusing on object interactions.
dcterms:title: CMU

dcterms:creator: A. Fathi
Y. Li
J. Rehg
dcterms:description: GTEA+ is a dataset designed for recognizing daily actions, featuring videos annotated with verb-noun pairs that describe the actions performed.
dcterms:title: GTEA+

dcterms:creator: D. Damen
T. Leelasawassuk
O. Haines
A. Calway
W. Mayol-Cuevas
dcterms:description: BEOID is a dataset that includes a variety of activities and locations, allowing for free annotations of object interactions, enabling a rich exploration of semantic relationships.
dcterms:title: BEOID
